website_summaries.verdict: The Jabra Sport Pace is an unapologetically bass-forward Bluetooth earphone pair designed to withstand your sweaty workouts.
pros: Powerful audio performance with seriously boosted bass response
Works with a free companion exercise app
cons: Digital signal processing will irk some—as will the mega-bass sound

customer_reviews.title: Great for running with Apple Watch until they nearly burn down your house
customer_reviews.text: I have tried out several different wireless headphones for running with my Apple Watch and these have worked well until they melted and nearly burned down my house while charging after only a couple weeks of use. The customer support from Jabra has been nothing but a hassle and extremely time consuming. If you buy these don’t charge them unless you are nearby and monitoring. I would advise against buying these.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Turner

customer_reviews.title: Only good for 6 months
customer_reviews.text: I just got these in March and they already stopped working. I put the headphones on and they connected and then made a static like sound and wouldn't turn on. Immediately after I use them I put them away carefully. I think when you spend this much money on something and take good care of them then they should work longer then 6 months. Next time I'll buy something for a little more so that there's an actual warranty on the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 2nd pair - both stopped working few months after purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of these. I like them because they are smallish for bluetooth headphones and they stay in my ear well. They however stop working after not so long. The first pair lasted a little over a year, my second pair lasted about 7 months. Frustrating considering they aren't super cheap. Don't waste your money, they'll likely break (look at all the reviews saying the same thing!) a few months after purchase.
customer_reviews.author: KinDC

customer_reviews.title: I loved the older version of these
customer_reviews.text: I loved the older version of these. The sound is great, but the quality of the the wire is not as durable. Also, I noticed that the light that is supposed to turn red is now orange after only a few weeks of using; not sure if it is due to me perspiring while I am working out. They are supposed to be water resistant. All around I like these, but seem like the quality went down a bit. I had my first pair for about 4 years until they just stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Buy - Stop working after a few months
customer_reviews.text: Bought a pair for myself and they worked great for a few months, so I bought my husband a pair. Mine stopped working after 6 months of light use, so I thought I had a dud. Now his are doing the same thing as mine. Fully charged, will not connect to any device. No updates on Jabra app I downloaded. Push the button to connect and just hear a “Buh boop,” but I no longer hear the “To connect your Jabra product...” also, the light is permanently blue/purple.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: Exceedingly disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Dead already (< a week) These sound good enough and are fairly comfortable for the price. I have some other Jabra products that have been great so I really wanted to like these and was looking forward to using them. Out of the package, I could not get them to turn off after use. They would just run dead, which makes them basically unusable for a workout device that might sit in a gym bag overnight. Now, after less than a week, they won't charge. The indicator light just stays red and they don't work anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Good

customer_reviews.title: Stopped charging after 3 months of use
customer_reviews.text: I used these with an indoor bike. No problem pairing and they worked fine for 3 months. Sound quality wasn’t amazing but more than adequate. I sweat a lot on the bike so perhaps these aren’t waterproof? Whatever the reason, after 3 months they no longer take a charge. This is the third pair of “inexpensive” ear buds I have purchased and all seem to break after 3-9 months of use.
customer_reviews.author: WVAXA

customer_reviews.title: Broke down after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: This pair broke down on me after 6 months from the purchase date. I suspect it had something to do with my sweata when exercising. Jabra should not have marketed this one as water proof or fit for exercise. Before breaking down i did like the pair so much. It would have had great value for money if it had lasted.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: not worth it and is just really lame. Half the time it won't connect
customer_reviews.text: The earbuds just won't last. Bought two pair, one quit working and I failed to register it and thus could not replace it under warranty. Bought the second pair, registered it and it quit working 2 months later but did get it replaced under warranty. Software is a joke, not worth it and is just really lame. Half the time it won't connect, a quarter of the time it will connect but completely ignores all app settings and does it's own thing then the other quarter of the time it works. Too expensive for all the hassles, even the iphone health app works more reliably than jabra.
customer_reviews.author: Rod Herring

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend, good battery life, comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Got a set for Christmas and loved them so much I bought a set for my boyfriend's birthday. Perfect for running or machines at the gym, no cord connecting you to your phone, so no accidentally yanking your headphones out. I typically keep my phone close by, so I'm not sure on the Bluetooth range. Battery life is great. I use the headphones for about an hour 3-4 days a week before they need to be charged. They also come with multiple sizes for the ear bid part, making them very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: OK at first but not durable for the intended use.
customer_reviews.text: These sound just "OK" and now on the second set, they have both failed the same way. Somehow they either get shorted out from sweat somewhere or they just stop working. I've googled for the symptom (charging light stays red but won't turn on anymore) and there seem to be no results. For the price of these, you'd expect them to be weatherproof.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas L

customer_reviews.title: Last less than 2 months and then they are trash
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these at the end of May 2018 and they worked until the beginning of July 2018 and then they just died. I contact customer service and after a couple of weeks, I finally got them replaced and were in hand at the end of July 2018. The new pair last until the first week of September 2018 and now they are dead. These things are junk!!!! I will just write off my money and look for something different. Too bad, because the older model lasted a couple of years. Get it together Jabra.
customer_reviews.author: Donovan Heavener

customer_reviews.title: They only get a one because I have to. ...
customer_reviews.text: They only get a one because I have to. These headphones will not hold a charge for more than 40 minutes before just quitting. Had them for 1 month.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Klingemann

customer_reviews.title: Does not charge to full battery anymore
customer_reviews.text: So I bought these for my husband. He loved them at first. Then they stopped charging to 100% and only now charge less than 50% because they only last him 25 minutes. They used to last a few hours. They are not durable. Maybe we got a bad one because he bought another pair at another store and they have been working great.
customer_reviews.author: Maryann Olson

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I like how it works so far. The little cover on the charging side has already broken to be careful when you are moving it for charging. I like using it for exercises and have used it to speak with people on the phone and does great. It helps keep the noise level down and serves well to listen to music, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Alfredo E. Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Detail oriented
customer_reviews.text: Well I used to own a pair and lost them. They worked fantastic, which is why I wanted another pair! When I placed my order it only took about 6 or 7 days to arrive. But when I got them, absolutely nothing worked on them. Couldn't even find them as a "bluetooth" accessorie on my phone? Over all if you are willing to pay the price for retail ones you'll be happy. But not these specific pair!
customer_reviews.author: zach

customer_reviews.title: They worked great at first
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this last March. They worked great at first, but then about 6 weeks later suddenly stopped. The company was great and replaced them. However, the second pair only lasted a little over 2 months. I have since gone back to my old fashioned ear buds with wires. Wish I would have spent a little extra on a slightly more expensive/reputable brand.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Crap!!
customer_reviews.text: Crap!!!! Save your money and time. I've had to return 2 pairs after 7 months. And this time, when I attempted to return them, they could only offer me 40% off the purchase of another one of their products. The control piece falls apart. These headphones were not made properly. Suggest buying them when they drop to $10 or below. I paid over $94. Junk!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: GLDT

customer_reviews.title: 2 Month Shelf Life
customer_reviews.text: Had 2 months and do not charge!!! We have purchased 6 pairs in 2016 and every pair ends in the same result. Why do these have a shelf life of 2 months???
customer_reviews.author: Casey Fallon

customer_reviews.title: On Closeout
customer_reviews.text: This is my second set. They were on closeout so I picked up another pair. They are ok for sound, but the battery life is only about 2 hours. Like me other set, they are about the same. That's the only issue with them. Not bad for the on sale price. I wouldn't have purchased them again at the regular price.
customer_reviews.author: AZ BigC

customer_reviews.title: Bought these for my son. They worked perfectly for ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son. They worked perfectly for the first month or so. After only 6 weeks, the earbuds will not turn on. For the price, this is unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product. Bought one set and used them three times. On the third charge, they didn't respond. I returned them for a second set thinking to give another set a try. Same issue on the second set. Only this time, they didn't even make it to their second charge. These things are trash. Don't waste your time.
customer_reviews.author: Hearditb4

customer_reviews.title: Run away from these
customer_reviews.text: Garbage! On my third pair from returns for not charging. This pair now has 21minute battery life and for $100 that isn't acceptable.
customer_reviews.author: J Hoerter

customer_reviews.title: ok at first, now just dead
customer_reviews.text: Worked ok when I first got them last year. Battery didn't last as long as advertised, but that's pretty typical I suppose. Now they're just completely dead. Light goes on when they're "charging", but when unplugged from power it's as if they have no power at all. Perhaps the battery is shot and unable to hold a charge anymore. Regardless...can't use them, can't update software to them, can't really do anything with them 18 months in. Pretty unhappy with this product and I'll probably never try Jabra headphones again.
customer_reviews.author: apl

customer_reviews.title: Love the product
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality on these is awesome, they are reliable and durable. I use them to workout everyday. The only downside is it seems the battery needs to be charged every other day but otherwise its great. The product support has been great and everyone at Jabra is helpful
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Not durable.
customer_reviews.text: I used these no more than 10 times and they’ve just stopped working. They worked fine one day and the next they just wouldn’t turn on anymore even though it looked like they were charging. Battery life is ok. 90 minutes into a run it was already at medium battery. Can’t somay how long the battery actually lasts because they stopped working before I could use them on really long runs. Such a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Novotny

customer_reviews.title: Left headphone died spontaneously after charging
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of headphones except that the left headphone stopped working spontaneously after I charged it today. Exceptional gain on the microphone and good sound quality --- really upset that it broke without any abuse to cause it to. Not worth the premium for the brand over generic ones.
customer_reviews.author: Nosferatu

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones while they lasted
customer_reviews.text: Same issue as another reviewer. After two weeks, these would no longer charge. I called Jabra and after much troubleshooting, they determined this product is years old and the seller was not authorized therefore Jabra would not honor a warranty. Great headphones while they lasted. Bad on the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Reegan M.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Battery Life
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item on Jan 2. After four months of regular use, the battery only lasts about 15 mins. Jabra replaced the broken unit in May. Then, after about three months of using the new, replacement unit, it, too, stopped working. It wouldn't charge at all. I believe Jabra will replace the second broken unit. But that is two defective units in the span of seven months. I will not purchase Jabra products again.
customer_reviews.author: David Downs

customer_reviews.title: Crap earbuds
customer_reviews.text: 2nd pair of Jabra Sport Pace wireless earbuds. First pair quit working after a week. I thought maybe I accidently dropped them in water. I bought a second pair....this time I got 3 runs out of them and now they won't charge. Total waste.
customer_reviews.author: LYNN85

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair as I used the first pair for several years and loved them. My new pair is just as great. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Decent earbuds
customer_reviews.text: I use them mainly while running/jogging and it works and sounds fine, I usually change the ear buds to the bigger sized ones for more wind cancellation noise. But the only dislike I have is whenever I take on the phone using these, others say it picks up background noise way too much.
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian

customer_reviews.title: Stay away from these headphones!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones died within three months, after twenty charges at most. Prior to that, the battery life was only about 1.5 hours, nowhere near the claimed life! For the price of these you'd expect a far more robust product. Customer service from Jabra for the warranty claim was good, but their choice of UPS to deliver the replacement was a failure - UPS lost the package so I never received the replacement set. Stay well clear of these headphones, there are plenty of better options out there for similar or less expensive prices.
customer_reviews.author: Matt L

customer_reviews.title: Great set of earphones for working out.
customer_reviews.text: Great set of earphones for working out. Durable and easy to clean. Sound quality is great
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Sato

customer_reviews.title: Will not charge
customer_reviews.text: After purchasing, this headset would not fully charge. My previous set was great. I used them for about two years.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Elkins

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: 1) They stopped connecting to any bluetooth devices within 2 weeks of purchase. 2) The interface to pair, pause, check battery, or use any other common functions is not intuitive at all. 3) There is a light that is supposed to show you whether the item is pairing or charging, and it never worked from the outset. Buyer beware. This is not a high quality product.
customer_reviews.author: EPond

customer_reviews.title: They fit great and stay in while working out
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of Jabra Sport Pace Wireless Bluetooth Earbuds. They fit great and stay in while working out. Unfortunately, after only a few weeks, the first pair stopped working. I returned them to Amazon for a new pair, and after 2 months, I couldn't get them to shut off. I would use them on the way to work and couldn't use them on the way home because the battery was dead. My return window is closed, so I think I'm better off trying a different product.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah E. Flannery

customer_reviews.title: These headphones don't last.
customer_reviews.text: I've had two pairs, and both pairs stopped working within only a few months of use. The second pair were used about 10 times before they failed. I expect better performance at the price Jabra is asking. I have purchased other headphones in the same price range that have been much more robust.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy, Must Have
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, no issues after more than a year of use. Basically the same as the Beats version but half the price. Battery lasts for a full week of workouts and no problems with them falling out of my ears like other ear buds. Even bought a second pair for my girlfriend.
customer_reviews.author: David Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for good price
customer_reviews.text: Their sound is ok for the price you pay. If you rather focus on the sound you better look for other ones. Their fit is great and they last me for 3hours per charge
customer_reviews.author: Omar Rabago

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: I love that these stay put with running, yoga or whatever else I throw at them.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Awesome headphones for a pretty decent price
customer_reviews.text: Awesome headphones for a pretty decent price. I love the freedom of not having a cord, and these headphones allow me to change songs whenever I want. They're solidly built, too, and have a no-tangle cord. Wonderful product!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Cramer

customer_reviews.title: Phone call audio on other end Sucks!
customer_reviews.text: Audio sounds great but when making a phone call or receiving a phone call it continues to sound distorted on the caller's end. Tried every option possible to hard restart and still the same thing. Returned it. My other pair works great!
customer_reviews.author: Steven S.

customer_reviews.title: Power never goes off
customer_reviews.text: I'm unable to turn it off. Even when it's said it's off, the blue light stays on and uses the battery power. So when I go to use it my power level is already down to 50%
customer_reviews.author: William K.

customer_reviews.title: The sound good and have very little interference
customer_reviews.text: The girlfriend loves these while running. The sound good and have very little interference. She also is quite fond of the running app that goes with them. She's been pushing me to get a pair of my own, so they must be good as she is a discerning consumer.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Maney

customer_reviews.title: After 8 months they stopped working
customer_reviews.text: One big negative: After owning Jabra Sport for eight months, they just stopped working. The sound was good and they were comfortable to wear. Being generous (simply because I did not keep careful track), they held about a four hour charge. I took extremely good care of them, used them for running about an hour a day -- most of the time on an indoor treadmill. They never got wet, and yet they just would not turn on one morning.
customer_reviews.author: GA

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and fit
customer_reviews.text: I have two issues with them. The ear piece that hooks over the ear is uncomfortable and the piece that goes inside my ear doesn’t seem to fit right, especially the right ear. After an hour of wearing them my ears hurt. I wear them while I’m doing housework, exercising and working in the yard.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: headphones didn't last 3 months and I tried twice
customer_reviews.text: the first one i bought stopped working within 2 weeks. I sent it back to get another. Now, three months later the headphones do not seem to shut off when I power them down and will not hold a charge. I have no plans on giving Jabra a third chance to disappoint me.
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Average
customer_reviews.text: Not the most comfortable. I live in Florida so I run in the rain and heat. It is durable so far. Battery life does not measure up to cheaper brands that I have had.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Doodles

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, good sound, snug fit
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these. I was looking for something specific and jabra seemed to be the only model out there that met all the specifications. Wireless/decent battery life/truly good sound quality/ and the most important was wrapping around the ear. It was the only reason I was willing to pay the price.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew W Batchelor

customer_reviews.title: hurts my ears
customer_reviews.text: I did not like the product as the support structure hurts really bad.
customer_reviews.author: Akash Rai

customer_reviews.title: absolutely terrible product
customer_reviews.text: I honestly wish I could rate this product lower than 1 star. The headphones stopped charging after their first use, which apparently is not uncommon from reading the rest of the reviews. Not sure why the price went up 18 dollars since I bought these.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: I really do love these headphones
customer_reviews.text: I really do love these headphones, they make gym time go by without a hitch. I wish they did come with a carrying case though. I'm afraid of throwing them in my purse or gym bag for the wires to get kinked. I have a Samsung Galaxy S4 and the sound quality is great; volume could go a little louder though. Oh ya, I also bought a pair of these exact headphones for my daughter as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Jurado

customer_reviews.title: If you have a big head and beard beware!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice headset. Sound quality was good as well, but the cord is a little on the short side. I have a big head and beard so the mic was always brushing against my beard causing static for other end. Had the cord been about 3 inches longer I would have been ok.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: it's not very comfortable for ears, and I think I cannot use a sunshine glasses with it. But the sound is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Dallmann

customer_reviews.title: Boost your workout with Jabra Sport Pace
customer_reviews.text: These Earbuds are perfect for exercising! They are very comfortable and the sound is great. The Sport Life App is easy to use and I like how it tracks my workouts and lets me customize them. The quick tap of the left button gives you a distance update. I was so happy that they came in fun colors, so that I could choose something other than black.
customer_reviews.author: LSUKID

customer_reviews.title: Second Pair
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair that I have purchased. I never had a problem with the first pair and loved them. One of my children stepped on them and they were out of warranty, hence needing a second pair. Run everyday and these work the best.
customer_reviews.author: Joe M.

customer_reviews.title: Battery and power issues
customer_reviews.text: Crap, such a disappointment, previous Jabra headphones were excellent until dog ate them, this pair has never held a charge and does not charge or work without rebooting everytime.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Papin

customer_reviews.title: No more wrestling with dangling wire
customer_reviews.text: They are of a fairly solid design. They sound good when properly position on the ears (takes some adjusting). I hear some notes, pitches and instruments in my music which I had not been hearing with lesser headphones before. And now I don't have to wrestle with a dangling headphone wire getting caught around an exercise bar at the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald W. Boyd

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: They were great for a while and then all of a sudden stopped working. I can't turn them on!
customer_reviews.author: Domian Family

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy
customer_reviews.text: These were a replacement pair for the first set that did not work. Prior to the battery not being able to hold a charge (within one month), these headphones skipped quite a lot when used during exercise. On the plus side, they are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: JCM

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 times. Both stopped working after about 3 months. Won't charge. Save yourself the hassle and buy another brand
customer_reviews.author: daniel denmark

customer_reviews.title: I think these are better than Bose and beats
customer_reviews.text: Second pair I've had in 3 years, I really enjoy them. I've used Bose and Beats, I prefer these by far. They are easy to use, comfortable and have a low profile look when they sit on your ears. I've had some very sweaty workouts and they do not short out from the moisture. If I ever need to, I will definitely buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Great Look and Sound.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to wear while cycling and they work great! I love the sound from them. They are easy to sync up with other devices & are easy to operate. My wife has the Beats headphones and even she said they sounded comparable. I personally like them better due to the cord going down the back of the ear rather than the front. Great product and am thoroughly satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tight fit and not load enough. Very quite, ...
customer_reviews.text: Tight fit and not load enough. Very quite, I'll give them to my kids and buy something else. When I'm at the gym I don't want to hear people talking, I can hear way to much noise.
customer_reviews.author: wildermind75

customer_reviews.title: Melted while charging
customer_reviews.text: This was my third try on these Jabra earbuds in nine months. The first pair split at one of the seams. The second would not charge after about two months of use. I used this pair around four times, and it completely melted while I had it charging. I don't think I will be purchasing Jabras again.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn A. Froncek

customer_reviews.title: Fit is good, sweat-proof and easy connection
customer_reviews.text: Been using it for about a month now and no complaints yet. A bit bass heavy but that doesn't bother me, one thing i've noticed was that i can hear my surrounding even when i'm listening to music. Fit is good, sweat-proof and easy connection!
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Eardbuds
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are fantastic. The rubber earplugs do not fall off. The sound quality is great. I think the Jabra sport is a better durable product than the Beats Bluetooth earbuds. The only negative is, I wish there was a voice instead of a tone when disconnecting from the Smartphone and when powering down. Also wish they had notice cancelling.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great for running
customer_reviews.text: I have used these now for a few months and totally love them no complaints at all. I run with these in and they stay put I walk and they stay put what more could you want 😉
customer_reviews.author: Gary & Nichole Salatino

customer_reviews.title: Head phones are fake decent...
customer_reviews.text: Heads phones are decent and work as expected. Make sure to get a set of tips because the ones that come with the head phones are trash.
customer_reviews.author: DeForest Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy, poorest of quality, service and a complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: Frustrated that after waiting for some time to ship to philippines, the item does not work. It wont turn on. A waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan D.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Light weight. I love this and have bought it for 3 people, which all love it too.
customer_reviews.author: Tamika Love

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this the end of May 2018 and it does not keep a charge and will not work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product
customer_reviews.text: Total crap. Do not advise buying. Stopped holding a charge for more than 20 minutes 4 months after I purchased them. Tried to return/exchange, however, since I am out of the one month return period, I am getting the total screw over this. Spend your money on higher quality earbuds.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Durable and a quality product!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd pair of these headphones. I love them. The first pair worked fine but was used and abused and accidentally washed one too many times so I decided to replace them. Great quality. You will be happy.
customer_reviews.author: Travis B

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My husband stole these from me. I literally didn't even get a chance to try it out. He is super picky and he told me that he LOVED it. It was comfortable and it didnt move around like the other ones he has previously tried.
customer_reviews.author: Vera

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought these headphones to use in the gym, because they were cheap and are sweat-proof. I was really pleased with the sound quality, but the battery life could be better as it lasts around 4-5 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Bjorgvin

customer_reviews.title: THEY SUCK- won't charge after 5 weeks and can't return them
customer_reviews.text: A whopping 5 weeks and they no longer hold a charge. A complete piece of crap. I would never buy this Jabra s*** again.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Dont but these!
customer_reviews.text: They worked great for a month and now they won't charge. Don't waste your time, I've read many reviews with the same issue.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Don’t work
customer_reviews.text: Have used these only twice and the left earbud stopped working
customer_reviews.author: Karen D.

customer_reviews.title: Water leakes in
customer_reviews.text: I bought this off Amazon on February 9th and had great luck with it until it started to fail in May and by June 1st it's dead. I we will be calling the company to see what they can do.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: durable, decent battery life, don't dangle or pull on your ears. I ran Robie Creek in Boise ID. in them and they are hands down the best pair i have used.
customer_reviews.author: tommy baker

customer_reviews.title: USED, DAMAGED, MISSING PARTS, NOT RECONDITIONED
customer_reviews.text: Packaging was intact but obvious damage to ear bud, missing spare ear gels, and missing USB cable. Had hair on one of the ear gels. Definitely not reconditioned as advertised!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron T.

customer_reviews.title: Failed After Nine Months (2 Pairs)
customer_reviews.text: I bought these headphone about a year and a half ago and they completely died after about 9 months... I got a replacement (sent by Jabra for free) and they died again after about 9 months....
customer_reviews.author: Runwithheadphones

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: PRODUCT FAILED after 2 1/2 months. Right after returns aren't allowed anymore. What a rip-off.
customer_reviews.author: phuncropper

customer_reviews.title: Very poor product!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the product in December and by May of the following year, the headphones would no longer charge. Very poor product !
customer_reviews.author: NYNY

customer_reviews.title: When worked - they had great sound - better than many others i have tried
customer_reviews.text: these stopped working a few a few days. When worked - they had great sound - better than many others i have tried. will try another pair of these as I liked the sound and fit. Just think had a lemon.
customer_reviews.author: Edward5

customer_reviews.title: My husband is very happy with the wireless headphones
customer_reviews.text: My husband is very happy with the wireless headphones! He says he can keep his cellphone in his gym locker, and run around the track and still have clear audio quality! Very comfortable and fashionable.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Andujar

customer_reviews.title: Will no longer charge
customer_reviews.text: For 18 months these were the best headphones: excellent sound quality, lightweight, and snug/comfortable fit. Now they won't charge. For $100 I would expect a longer life cycle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for small ears!
customer_reviews.text: They fit into my small ears which most brands do not. They also stay in during exercise
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Good sound
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for the price, battery is not the best tho. Good sound comparable to regular apple earbuds
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: You're missing out!
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, LOVE these earbuds! They exceeded my expectations and I couldn't be happier. I am an avid athlete; weightlifter and runner and they don't fall out during any exercise or run. I turn on them and forget they're there....I just go! Best thing and all the bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.author: Denise N. Burnham

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Volume is low at highest setting (when I run on the beach I can hardly hear the music over the waves). The sound quality is tinny as well. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: JoPo

customer_reviews.title: Stops charging consistently after a few weeks, the button ...
customer_reviews.text: Stops charging consistently after a few weeks, the button to turn on/off and pause/play is very finicky, and even turning the headphones on and off doesn't always work, even when charged
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the rapid charge!
customer_reviews.text: I love the Jabra Sport Pace. It has been great for working out at the park. My favorite feature is the rapid charge. I tend to be forgetful when it comes to remembering to charge my devices and I love that I can charge my Jabra Sport Pace for an hour work out in about 15 minutes in the car on the way! It really comes in handy for a mom like myself!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Totally satisfied. I was tired of getting tangled in the cords! This works great !
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Broke too quickly
customer_reviews.text: These broke within 1st six months of purchase. Used a good bit but did not hold as I would have expected for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Hudson

customer_reviews.title: The sound quality for phone calls is distorted and if you are working out it is worst. Not pleased with this at all
customer_reviews.text: The earbud is very uncomfortable. The sound quality for phone calls is distorted and if you are working out it is worst. Not pleased with this at all.
customer_reviews.author: Celena Pitts

customer_reviews.title: Headphones Not Working!!! HELP
customer_reviews.text: These headphones were great for the first few weeks but no buttons work now and they wont even connect to bluetooth. When I try and turn them on it is stuck on a solid blue light. When I try to charge them no light illuminates?? Anybody else have these issues
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these headphones ! I do wish there were a little louder but spud quail rye is good and they are comfortable in my ears!
customer_reviews.author: Nina Thompson

product_meta.title: Jabra Sport Pace Wireless Tooth Earbuds Blue
